title: Say Yes to the Dress Arabia
overview: The Arabian edition is the 25th local spin-off of the popular series featuring 20 brides from various cultural backgrounds, ranging in age from 23 to 50, all in search for their dream wedding dress.Shot at the Hazar Haute Couture in Dubai which houses an unrivalled collection of bridal dresses that perfectly accommodated the bridal budgets ranging from $615 to $14,000.The show captures the emotional journeys of brides-to-be, bundled with the show's trademark fun family drama, as each loved one holds their own opinion on the dress. Hosted by renowned Lebanese celebrity stylist, Khalil Zein, an expert and in-demand stylist in the Arab world, Khalil has dressed many celebrities from across the region, including Haifa Wehbe, Nancy Ajram and more.
